channel.title: Looking for SaaS business owner to interview for school project

item.title: Looking for SaaS business owner to interview for school project
item.dc:creator: FaisalSyed123
item.description:
Hi

I have a career project in which I am supposed to interview an entrepreneur; someone who runs a small software company. This company has application(s) with some monthly recurring revenue. If you would be willing to accept the interview over email I would very much appreciate it. I would like to get your name , address , company name, and job title. The interview will be 15 questions that you may answer at your own leisure, and I would need them back 3 weeks from now. Again thank you in advance.

@FaisalSyed123

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for SaaS business owner to interview for school project
